task: Search for articles by the author 'Sarah Johnson' on autoimmune diseases, gather metadata for 10 articles, and create a comprehensive summary and critique of her research trends.

Find articles related to 'AI ethics in healthcare' through keyword search, summarize key discussions from 10 articles, and prepare a reasoned analysis and report on ethical challenges and recommendations.
Search PubMed by keyword for articles on ketogenic diets, retrieve metadata for the top 8 results, and create a summary highlighting dietary impacts on metabolic health.
Identify and download PDFs of the seminal articles on 'epigenetics and cancer,' summarize their key findings, and prepare a report on the evolution of this research area.
Search for articles mentioning 'CRISPR gene editing' and generate a concise summary highlighting the main advancements and challenges discussed.
Perform a keyword search for studies related to diabetes treatments published in the last five years, download PDFs of the most cited articles, and prepare a detailed comparative analysis.
Find and download the full text PDFs of articles studying the impact of air pollution on asthma, then summarize the main conclusions and public health implications.
Identify recent breakthroughs in antibiotic resistance research by searching for relevant keywords, download selected PDFs, and generate a comprehensive analysis and summary report.
